summary: The customer was having difficulty connecting to Contoso Wireless and was unable to get help from tech support. The agent suggested that the customer could try to move the device closer to a window or outside for better signal coverage. Alternatively, the agent recommended purchasing an external antenna or amplifier for a one-time cost, or switching to a satellite or fiber optic connection for a monthly fee. The agent recommended that the customer purchase an external antenna or amplifier as it would be the most cost-effective option.
